# Flowbite React Documentation

> Flowbite React is a UI component library based on Tailwind CSS and React, featuring interactive components for building modern web applications.

This documentation covers all aspects of using Flowbite React, from installation to advanced usage.

## Documentation Sections

### Getting started

- [Introduction](https://flowbite-react.com/docs/getting-started/introduction.md)
- [Quickstart](https://flowbite-react.com/docs/getting-started/quickstart.md) (updated)
- [Compatibility](https://flowbite-react.com/docs/getting-started/compatibility.md)
- [CLI](https://flowbite-react.com/docs/getting-started/cli.md) (updated)
- [Editor Setup](https://flowbite-react.com/docs/getting-started/editor-setup.md)
- [AI Integration](https://flowbite-react.com/docs/getting-started/ai-integration.md)
- [Server Components](https://flowbite-react.com/docs/getting-started/server-components.md)
- [License](https://flowbite-react.com/docs/getting-started/license.md)
- [Changelog](https://flowbite-react.comhttps://github.com/themesberg/flowbite-react/releases.md)
- [Contributing](https://flowbite-react.com/docs/getting-started/contributing.md)
